GSD.description:
drm/amdkfd: handle CPU fault on COW mapping

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit b1f852277171ad87a37bf42835839c306b7f05dd. For more details please see the references link.
